thread.title: Someone Should Write a Song About How Good Faith Hill and Tim McGraw Look at the Grammys
thread.title_full: Someone Should Write a Song About How Good Faith Hill and Tim McGraw Look at the Grammys

author: Quinn Keaney
title: Someone Should Write a Song About How Good Faith Hill and Tim McGraw Look at the Grammys
text:
Faith Hill and Tim McGraw at the 2017 Grammys Someone Should Write a Song About How Good Faith Hill and Tim McGraw Look at the Grammys   Someone Should Write a Song About How Good Faith Hill and Tim McGraw Look at the Grammys 
We already knew that Faith Hill and Tim McGraw were pretty damn cute , but their outing at the Grammys on Sunday really had us swooning. The couple, who recently celebrated 20 years of marriage , hit the glitzy award show's red carpet looking stunning and adorable as usual. Faith cranked the heat up in her jaw-dropping red dress, while Tim paired a suit with his trademark cowboy hat. Although they've been busy gearing up for their upcoming joint world tour, they both took a break to celebrate Tim's best country song nomination for "Humble and Kind." Even if he doesn't get the big win , it sure looks like they'll be heading home with even bigger prizes (each other, duh). Related:
